channel.title: Urgent Help!
channel.description: I found a random PI source and a random PI based client. & I want to run both of them together but I can't because the IP in the client sends me somewhere else. How do I set the IP in the client so I could play wherever I want?

item.title: Urgent Help!
item.dc:creator: @epkserver epkserver
item.description:
@epkserver wrote:

In your client folder search:

if (myPrivilege == 2 || server.equals

now replace that IP with "127.0.0.1 or “0.0.0.0”

doesnt matter.

save and compile

Read full topic
